name: 0.3.0: multiple PRs merged
body:
Thanks to all the contributors!!!

## What's Changed
* Fixed problem to resend goal. by @CihatAltiparmak in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/28
* minor comment fix by @mnumanuyar in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/29
* Expose parameter to control timeout on wait_for call by @vicmassy in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/32
* fix onTick signature by @SyllogismRXS in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/36
* Add Action CI check by @emersonknapp in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/35
* Return failure on action rejection by @marj3220 in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/39
* Add timeout on spin to avoid infinite loop by @vicmassy in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/40
* Check service and action servers before calling by @marip8 in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/47
* Fix cancel goal with empty goal handle by @vicmassy in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/53
* Fix delayed subscription missing first message and change topic name by @tony-p in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/52
* Export plugins to share directory by @MarqRazz in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/54
* Add pre-commit config and workflow by @MarqRazz in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/56
* Action Server to execute trees by @facontidavide in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/60
* Issues 61 and 63 by @facontidavide in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/65
* add payloads to Action by @facontidavide in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/66
* Register multiple nodes with single plugin by @MarqRazz in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/68
* Changing new Nav2 URL by @SteveMacenski in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/72
* Action payload by @facontidavide in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/73
* Rename msgs to msg by @AdrianZw in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/81
* fix: resolve MSVC build errors and warnings by @tony-p in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/91
* Fix link to global blackboard tutorial by @sea-bass in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/94
* Update deprecated header by @KmakD in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/108
* Deprecated rmw_qos_profile_t and ament_target_dependencies by @elsayedelsheikh in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/119
* Change ClientInstance Registry insert to insert_or_assign by @perry-reframe in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/114
* Add service to get the list of loaded trees by @agonzat in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/107
* Added missing include guards by @b-adkins in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/98
* Made documentation more accurate and useful, including a Doxygen config. by @b-adkins in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/84
* Update bt_action_node.hpp by @pepeRossRobotics in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/89
* Add the ability for ros actions nodes to get access to the action result even on failure by @JayHerpin in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/79
* Add ROS2 logger by @tropappar in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/100

## New Contributors
* @CihatAltiparmak made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/28
* @mnumanuyar made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/29
* @SyllogismRXS made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/36
* @emersonknapp made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/35
* @marj3220 made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/39
* @marip8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/47
* @tony-p made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/52
* @MarqRazz made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/54
* @facontidavide made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/60
* @SteveMacenski made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/72
* @AdrianZw made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/81
* @sea-bass made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/94
* @KmakD made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/108
* @elsayedelsheikh made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/119
* @perry-reframe made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/114
* @agonzat made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/107
* @b-adkins made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/98
* @pepeRossRobotics made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/89
* @JayHerpin made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/79
* @tropappar made their first contribution in https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/pull/100

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/BehaviorTree/BehaviorTree.ROS2/compare/0.2.0...0.3.0
